name: Pollo Vallarta
description: Tender chicken breast, topped with shrimp, onions and melted cheese, served with Mexican rice, salad and tortillas

name: El Tapatio
description: A delightful serving of grilled chicken breast, with chorizo sausage then smothered with melted cheese, served with rice, salad, and warm tortillas

name: Milanesa
description: Breaded chicken breast or steak, deep fried, served with Mexican rice, beans and a salad

name: Arroz Con Pollo
description: Special homemade rice with grilled chicken topped with melted cheese dip

name: Al Pastor
description: Grilled chicken or pork and onions, topped with a spicy chipotle sauce, served with Mexican rice and beans
